t: Working as a Trainer at Amazon.com: 118 Reviews | Indeed.com
s: I loved working for Amazon as an ERC DLS Associate and later as a Trainer. My manager at the time, was one of the best managers I have ever worked for. She went out of her way to ensure my continued training, to answer my questions, and simply to check on my well being. The compensation package as an associate is great, but as an ERC DLS Trainer it was amazing. My only complaint was the short notice and how I was made to feel I had no choice ...
